original_text: He said to me, “I will give you many children, so that your descendants are many. In that way, you will become the ancestor of many nations. I will give this land to you so that it belongs to your descendants for ever.” ’
korean_text: 내게 이르시되 내가 너로 생육하고 번성하게 하여 네게서 많은 백성이 나게 하고 내가 이 땅을 네 후손에게 주어 영원한 소유가 되게 하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will give you many children
so that your descendants are many
you will become the ancestor of many nations
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 여러 민족의 조상이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will give this land to you
so that it belongs to your descendants for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그것이 영원히 너의 후손에게 속하게 하리라
